welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pascagoula, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Pascagoula has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jackson County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jackson County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Mobile Regional Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Mobile Regional Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport serves all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport serves private and charter flights, as well as offering services for private aircraft owners.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
